request_cancelled: Request to API server was cancelled
internet_connection_error: Connection to API server failed due to internet connection
unknown_error: Connection to API server failed due to Unknown Error
bad_certificates_error: Connection to API server failed due to Bad Certificate
password_chars_is_not_valid: The Minimum Numbers of Characters is 8
no_connection: No Internet connection, Please check your connection and try again
account_exist_error: An account with the same email already exists but is associated with a different credential.
credential_in_use_error: The credential is already associated with a user.
logo_semantic_label: This is the Movie Hub App Logo
open_screen_scaffold_semantic_label: This is the screen where you to choose to login or register

sign_up_with_email_or: Sign Up With Your Email Or
